title: Coconut Chocolate Chip Cookies
ingredients: ['170g unsalted butter, at room temperature', '1 tablespoon peanut butter', '330g dark brown soft sugar', '2 eggs', '1 tablespoon vanilla sugar', '1 teaspoon salt', '315g plain flour, sifted', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '75g desiccated coconut', '175-250g chocolate chips']
